nodes.name: execute

params.multiSigContract: (address) address of the multiSigOperations contract to handle multi sig updates on this contract structure

execute(address,uint256[],string,address.details: change the status of a credential

params.bytesParams: (bytes32[]) index 0 has to carry the status reason. other indexes not used
params.identity: (address) identity relative to changes to make
params.intParams: (uint256[]) index 0 has to carry the id of the credential to be changed. index 1 has to carry the credential Status code. other indexes not used
